item.title: Mukesh Khanna reveals media misquoted his statement about Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna reveals media misquoted his statement about Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff

Publication Date: Unknown Source: Unknown

Mukesh Khanna addressed a misinterpretation of his comments concerning Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff, clarifying the actual context of his statements.

  • Khanna expressed his surprise at the media's portrayal of his words.
  • He emphasized his respect for both Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff.
  • Khanna mentioned the need for accurate reporting to avoid misunderstandings.
‚ÄúIt's important that we don't misquote each other in the media.‚Äù

In conclusion, Khanna's response highlights the ongoing issue of media representation and miscommunication.

item.title: Game Changer worldwide box office collection Day 2: Ram Charan‚Äôs film sees massive dip, collects Rs 72.5 crore - The Indian Express
item.description:
Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 2: Major Dip Observed

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Indian Express

The latest release, Game Changer starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has seen a significant decline in its box office collection on the second day. Initial excitement is overshadowed by disappointing figures.

  • The film made a total of Rs 72.5 crore in its first two days.
  • Day 1 collection was reported at Rs 51 crore across all languages.
  • Day 2 saw a drastic drop, earning only Rs 21.5 crore.
  • There was a 57.84% dip in collections on Day 2.
  • Discrepancies in reported earnings have raised concerns about inflated numbers.
The king‚Äôs arrival is setting the box office ablaze ü§ôüèº #GameChanger takes a blockbuster opening at the BOX OFFICE üí•üí• GROSSES 186 CRORES WORLDWIDE on Day 1 ‚ù§‚Äçüî•‚Äî Game Changer (@GameChangerOffl)

The decline in box office performance suggests a lack of audience reception, and scrutiny over the film‚Äôs reported earnings continues.

item.title: Ajith Kumar‚Äôs racing team emerges 3rd in Dubai 24H 2025; R Madhavan, Sivakarthikeyan, Udhay Stalin, others congratulate - Mint
item.description:
Ajith Kumar‚Äôs Racing Team Secures Third Place in Dubai 24H 2025

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Tamil superstar Ajith Kumar made a remarkable return to racing, leading his team to a third-place finish in the 24H Dubai 2025 endurance race.

  • Ajith Kumar Racing secured victory in the 991 category and was recognized for the Spirit of the Race in the GT4 category.
  • The team celebrated their wins with the Indian flag as fans cheered on.
  • R Madhavan, Udhay Stalin, and others publicly congratulated Ajith Kumar on social media.
  • Ajith Kumar shared a heartfelt moment with his wife after his victory.
‚ÄúSo so proud.. what a man. The one and only. Ajith Kumar,‚Äù - R Madhavan

Ajith Kumar's achievements in the race serve as an inspiration, showcasing his dedication and passion for the sport.

item.title: Ex-band member of Fossils found hanging - The Times of India
item.description:
Ex-band member of Fossils found hanging

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

A member of the famous band Fossils has been discovered hanging, shocking fans and the music community alike.

  • The incident raised many questions regarding the circumstances leading to the member's demise.
  • Fans expressed their grief and support on social media platforms.
  • The band has been a significant part of the regional music scene for years, with a loyal fanbase.
‚ÄúThis is devastating news for all of us who loved their music,‚Äù said a fan.

The news has left fans and fellow musicians in deep sorrow, prompting an outpouring of tributes across various media.

item.title: Telugu actor Rana Daggubati, family members booked over Deccan Kitchen Hotel demolition: Report - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Rana Daggubati and Family Face Legal Action Over Hotel Demolition

Published: 12 January 2025 | Source: Hyderabad News

A case has been filed against Telugu actor Rana Daggubati and several family members, including actor Venkatesh Daggubati, over the demolition of a hotel in Hyderabad that was run by a businessman on land leased from the Daggubati family.

  • The FIR was registered under IPC sections like criminal conspiracy and house trespass.
  • The complainant, who has a pending lawsuit regarding the lease, claims the family unlawfully demolished the hotel structure.
  • The incident prompted a court directive for police investigation.
"The Daggubati family had leased the premises in 2014, and the complainant alleges that they tried to unlawfully remove him from the property."

The case is ongoing, with police investigations being conducted following the court's instructions.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna reacts to Amitabh Bachchan's alleged remark, 'saala copy karta hai' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna reacts to Amitabh Bachchan's alleged remark, 'saala copy karta hai'

Publication Date: October 20, 2023   Source: Times of India

Mukesh Khanna has recently responded to alleged remarks made by Amitabh Bachchan, stating that he copies his work. This article delves into Khanna's reactions and perspectives on the matter.

  • The comments were made during a promotional event.
  • Khanna expressed surprise and disappointment over the remarks.
  • He emphasized his own originality in his work.
‚ÄúI have always strived to create unique content,‚Äù Khanna stated.

Khanna urges for respect and recognition for individual creativity in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Netizens slam Salman Khan, makers for wrongly targeting Karan Veer Mehra, say 'script fail ho - DNA India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Netizens slam Salman Khan, makers for wrongly targeting Karan Veer Mehra, say 'script fail ho gaya'

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: DNA India

In a recent episode of Bigg Boss 18, Salman Khan faced backlash from netizens for allegedly setting false narratives against contestant Karan Veer Mehra.

  • Salman Khan questioned Karan about his participation in the Ticket To Finale task.
  • Karan struggled to get his points across as Salman frequently interrupted him.
  • Viewers expressed their discontent on social media, labeling it the worst Weekend Ka Vaar episode.
  • Many users accused Salman of spreading lies and called Karan the smartest contestant this season.
‚ÄúSalman either didn't do his homework or makers felt the hype surrounding Karan Veer Mehra has damaged the confidence of other contestants.‚Äù - A netizen's take.

The ongoing season is nearing its finale, which is scheduled for January 19. The concluding week will feature a total of seven contestants trying to secure their spot for the grand finale.

item.title: Anushka Sharma, Virat Kohli's son Akaay Kohli makes his first appearance, video goes viral - India.com
item.description:
Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma's son Akaay makes his first 'public' appearance, watch viral video

Publication Date: January 12, 2025
Source: India.com

The first glimpse of Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli's son Akaay Kohli has surfaced online, as the couple's private life has generally kept their children away from the media.

  • The couple recently visited Vrindavan, where a video of their outing went viral, revealing their son Akaay's face to the public.
  • Akaay, who will turn one year old on February 15, 2025, has generally been kept out of the limelight, making this appearance significant.
  • Despite the couple's efforts to maintain privacy, a paparazzi shot captured Akaay, sparking widespread affection and praise on social media.
‚ÄúAkaay is even cuter than Taimur and Rhea,‚Äù commented an excited user.

The video was later removed to respect the family's privacy.

item.title: Rana Daggubati, Venkatesh and family members booked over Hyderabad hotel demolition - The News Minute
item.description:
Family of Actors Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati Face Legal Action Over Hotel Demolition in Hyderabad

Published on: 12 Jan 2025, 12:19 pm

Hyderabad police have registered a case against actors Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati along with their family members regarding the demolition of the Deccan Kitchen Hotel.

  • The Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation had partially demolished the hotel in November 2022.
  • The complete demolition of the structure was executed by the Daggubati family in January 2024.
  • A First Information Report (FIR) lists multiple Daggubati family members as accused, including Daggubati Suresh, Daggubati Venkatesh, Daggubati Rana, and Daggubati Abhiram.
  • The case is under various sections of the Indian Penal Code for house-trespass and criminal conspiracy.
  • A court directed the police to take action based on a complaint by Nanda Kumar, who alleges illegal demolition despite a court injunction.
  • Kumar claims to have suffered a loss of Rs 20 crore due to the actions of the Daggubati family.
Nanda Kumar claims to have suffered a loss of Rs 20 crore due to the demolition and vandalism.

This legal action highlights the ongoing disputes over property and legal compliance in urban development scenarios in Hyderabad.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 3: Ram Charan-Shankar film crosses Indian 2 lifetime, mints over ‚Çπ88 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 3: Shankar's Telugu debut film is not performing as expected, given that this is just its first week.

Jan 12, 2025 - Hindustan Times

The film Game Changer, directed by Shankar and starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has crossed the lifetime collection of Indian 2, grossing ‚Çπ88.93 crore in its opening weekend, although it is not performing as strongly as expected.

  • The film collected ‚Çπ16.33 crore on its third day.
  • On opening day, it earned ‚Çπ51 crore but saw a significant drop of 57.65% on day two, earning ‚Çπ21.6 crore.
  • Occupancy rates have also seen declines, particularly for the Telugu version.
  • The overall performance is being closely observed with competition from other new releases.
‚ÄúGame Changer tells the story of an IAS officer called Ram Nandan, linking his story to an activist called Appanna.‚Äù

Despite its impressive opening, the film's future box office performance remains uncertain as competition heats up in its subsequent weeks.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 3 (updated live): Ram Charan-Shankar film crosses Indian 2 lifetime - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 3 (updated live): Shankar's Telugu debut crossed lifetime collections of his much-hyped Kamal Haasan-starrer.

Date: Jan 12, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Shankar‚Äôs maiden Telugu film Game Changer has crossed the lifetime collection of his previous film, Indian 2. As of 7 PM, the film has grossed ‚Çπ85.09 crore net in India.

  • On its opening day, Game Changer collected ‚Çπ51 crore net in India.
  • Day 2 showed a significant drop with a 57.65% decrease, earning only ‚Çπ21.6 crore net.
  • The film registered an 18.01% occupancy for its morning shows.
  • The competition includes Balakrishna‚Äôs Daaku Maharaaj and Venkatesh-starrer Sankranthiki Vasthunam.

‚ÄúThe film explores corruption in electoral politics with Suryah playing a corrupt politician.‚Äù

The film's performance has been underwhelming for a Sankranthi release, and its future collection remains uncertain as it faces competition from other films released during the festival season.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Rajat Dalal, Karan Veer Mehra, Vivian Dsena, Shilpa Shirodkar, top 5 most popular contestants this week - DNA India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Rajat Dalal, Karan Veer Mehra, Vivian Dsena, Shilpa Shirodkar, top 5 most popular contestants this week

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: DNA India

This week, Ormax Media reported on the top five most popular contestants in Bigg Boss 18. Here‚Äôs the breakdown:

  1. Rajat Dalal: Most popular overall but criticized for weak gameplay.
  2. Vivian Dsena: Controversial contestant, seen as favoured by the makers.
  3. Karan Veer Mehra: Regarded as the only deserving winner with commendable gameplay.
  4. Shilpa Shirodkar: Strong relationships throughout the show earned her a top spot.
  5. Avinash Mishra: Criticized for staying in the game, seen as a tool for the narrative.

As the show approaches its finale, audience opinions about contestant merit are more pronounced.

item.title: Thaman rules Sankranthi with back-to-back hits | Latest Telugu cinema news | Movie reviews | OTT Updates, OTT - 123telugu
item.description:
Thaman rules Sankranthi with back-to-back hits

Published on Jan 12, 2025 5:01 pm IST

This Sankranthi turned out to be a special one for music director Thaman, who had two big releases back-to-back. The first was Ram Charan‚Äôs Game Changer, followed by Balakrishna‚Äôs Daaku Maharaaj.

  • Both films featured Thaman's exceptional music, enhancing their overall feel.
  • Game Changer received mixed reviews, while Daaku Maharaaj became a super hit.
  • Thaman's powerful background scores and unique soundtracks elevated the movie-watching experience.
  • Fans have praised Thaman's work, acknowledging its impact on the films' success.
  • Thaman has several more big projects lined up, showing he is in high demand.
‚ÄúThaman‚Äôs music enhances the overall feel of a film.‚Äù

This Sankranthi reaffirms Thaman's significant influence in Telugu cinema, with audiences eager for his upcoming projects.

item.title: Ajith Kumar‚Äôs team clinches 3rd place in Dubai 24H race; Madhavan hails him as ‚Äòthe one and only‚Äô. Watch - The Indian Express
item.description:
Ajith Kumar‚Äôs team clinches 3rd place in Dubai 24H race; Madhavan hails him as ‚Äòthe one and only‚Äô. Watch

Publication Date: January 12, 2025

Source: Indian Express

Tamil superstar Ajith Kumar has triumphed in the 24H Dubai 2025 endurance race, securing third place in the 991 category and earning the Spirit of the Race recognition in the GT4 category.

  • Ajith Kumar Racing by Bas Koeten secured third place in the 991 category.
  • Ajith received recognition for the Spirit of the Race in the GT4 category.
  • Actor Madhavan praised Ajith‚Äôs accomplishment on social media, calling him ‚Äúthe one and only.‚Äù
  • Ajith's participation served as a boost after a recent training accident.
‚ÄúWhat a remarkable comeback after an accident due to a brake failure.‚Äù - Suresh Chandra

This victory is celebrated widely on social media, with fans showing their support and pride in Ajith Kumar's achievements.

item.title: Stray Kids‚Äô Bang Chan Forced To Miss Schedule Due To Health Complications - Koreaboo
item.description:
Bang Chan of Stray Kids Misses Scheduled Events Due to Health Issues

Publication Date: 6 hours ago | Source: Koreaboo

Stray Kids‚Äô leader Bang Chan will not be participating in certain scheduled activities today due to health concerns, according to an announcement from JYP Entertainment.

  • Bang Chan is experiencing unexpected flu-like symptoms.
  • He will miss the ‚ÄúÂêà (HOP)‚Äù SOUNDWAVE Korea video call and fan sign event.
  • Also missing the ‚ÄúÂêà (HOP)‚Äù StarRiver China video call event.

item.title: Ajith Kumar Bags 3rd Spot At 24H Dubai Race Despite Car Accident - Times Now
item.description:
Ajith Kumar Bags 3rd Spot At 24H Dubai Race Despite Car Accident

Publication Date: Sunday

Source: TNN

Actor Ajith Kumar secured the 3rd spot at the 24H Dubai Race on Sunday, despite facing a car crash during the practice session. Initially contemplating withdrawal, his spirit led him back to the competition, surprising fans and making his team proud.

Key Points

  • Ajith Kumar finished 3rd in the 991 category and received a special mention in the GT4 category.
  • The accident occurred during practice due to brake failure, but Kumar was unharmed.
  • Despite initial reluctance to participate post-accident, he ultimately decided to race.
  • The team emphasized Kumar's well-being and their assessment of the crash before he returned.

Notable Quotes

‚ÄúDouble whammy for Ajith Kumar 3rd place in the 991 category and Spirit of the race in the gt4 category. What a remarkable comeback after an accident due to a break failure.‚Äù - Ajith Kumar's Manager

This incident highlights his dedication to motorsport and the support of his team.

item.title: Salman Khan recalls Raveena Tandon fighting with him on-set, reacts to Rasha and Aman‚Äôs debut: ‚ÄòMain wahi ka wahi hoon‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Salman Khan recalls Raveena Tandon fighting with him on-set, reacts to Rasha and Aman‚Äôs debut: ‚ÄòMain wahi ka wahi hoon‚Äô

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

The latest episode of Bigg Boss 18 featured Salman Khan welcoming debutant actors Rasha Thadani and Aman Devgan, while Raveena Tandon joined as a special guest, sparking nostalgia and playful banter between the two stars.

  • Salman Khan acknowledged his personal connection with debutants Rasha Thadani and Aman Devgan.
  • Raveena Tandon and Salman Khan reminisced about their past work together, with amusing stories from their filming days.
  • Salman humorously commented on their unchanged status, saying he remains the same after all these years.
  • Memorable throwback photos were shared, including a young Rasha with Salman.
  • The episode also features cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal as a guest.
‚ÄúTumhari mummy mujhse bohot jhagda karti thi‚Äù - Salman Khan

This episode highlights the fun chemistry and nostalgia among Bollywood stars, celebrating both their past and the new generation of talent in the industry.

item.title: Preity Zinta shares her family is ‚Äòsafe as of now‚Äô amid LA wildfires: ‚ÄòI never thought I would live to see a day where‚Ä¶‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Preity Zinta shares her family is ‚Äòsafe as of now‚Äô amid LA wildfires: ‚ÄòI never thought I would live to see a day where‚Ä¶‚Äô

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: The Indian Express

Amid the raging wildfires in Los Angeles, Bollywood star Preity Zinta shared an update about her family's safety, expressing her heartbreak over the devastation in the area.

  • Preity Zinta reassured fans that her family is currently safe.
  • She expressed concern for friends and families affected by the wildfires.
  • Zinta shared a poignant message about the experience of living through the fire crisis.
  • Other celebrities, including Nora Fatehi and Priyanka Chopra, also commented on their experiences during the wildfires.

‚ÄúI never thought I would live to see a day where fires would ravage neighbourhoods around us in LA, friends & families either evacuated or put on high alert,‚Äù ‚Äî Preity Zinta

The wildfires are causing significant damage, impacting thousands, including several Hollywood celebrities.

item.title: Meet actress who once challenged Aishwarya Rai, Sushmita Sen, quit Bollywood to become a sadhvi, now tough to - India.com
item.description:
Barkha Madan: From Bollywood Star to Spiritual Monk

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: India.com

Once a competitor to Aishwarya Rai and Sushmita Sen, actress Barkha Madan has left the glamour of Bollywood behind to live a life dedicated to spirituality as a monk.

  • Barkha Madan participated in Miss India, winning the title of Miss Tourism India while Sushmita Sen was crowned the winner.
  • She made her Bollywood debut in 1996 alongside Akshay Kumar in 'Khiladiyon Ka Khiladi.'
  • Her notable performance was in the supernatural horror film 'Bhoot' (2003).
  • In 2012, she left her acting career to embrace Buddhism, adopting the name Gyalten Samten.
  • Today, she follows the teachings of the 14th Dalai Lama and shares her life experiences on social media.
‚ÄúThere came a turning point in Barkha‚Äôs career when her films like Surkhaab and Soch Lo failed to gain much appreciation.‚Äù

Barkha Madan's journey from a celebrated actress to a devoted monk highlights her commitment to peace and spirituality over fame.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 38: Enjoys A Bumper Jump Of 83%, Allu Arjun Starrer Is Unstoppable! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 38: Enjoys A Bumper Jump Of 83%, Allu Arjun Starrer Is Unstoppable!

Date & Source: Published on October 10, 2023, by Koimoi

Pushpa 2: The Rule is the biggest success in the history of the Hindi box office. It is officially in its sixth week but refuses to slow down.

  • Pushpa 2 Hindi earned 2.20 crores on day 38, with a jump of 83% compared to day 37.
  • The 38-day total earnings stand at 823.35 crores.
  • New version of Pushpa 2 will be released on January 17, 2024, featuring 20 minutes of additional footage.
  • Competition includes films like Game Changer and Fateh.
‚ÄúROI comes to 311.67%.‚Äù

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 continues to dominate the box office with impressive figures, showcasing strong public interest and resilience against competition.

item.description:

Sukumar's highly anticipated sequel, Pushpa 2: The Rule Reloaded, is set to release on January 17 with an additional 20 minutes of footage. Allu Arjun shares a teaser that reveals unseen scenes, including a significant Japan sequence.

‚ÄúThose who have said that all the P2 will make sense in P3 will have a good time now,‚Äù a fan commented.

The release of additional footage is highly anticipated and promises to enrich the narrative of Pushpa 2.
